1468610.name: Platformory
1468610.description:
Platformory

Platformory is a very very challenging game in which you must prove your platforming and memory skills simultaneously.

Platforming and memory combined

When playing a level in Platformory you will start off with a Memorizing Phase, in which you have to try to memorize the level as much as you can, because after you switch to the Playing Phase, most of the screen will become invisible, which means that you need to finish the level off of your memory.

Content

The content in Platformory consists of 50 levels that you play through linearly, but you can always play any level again.

Difficulty

Platformory is designed to be a very very challenging experience, please keep in mind that even if you consider yourself a hardcore gamer: Do not at all expect to beat the game in only a few tries.

Never give up, because every fail will make the feeling of finishing a level even more satisfying!

But just in case you ever want to skip a level, you can do so.
